Title: Authorizes the department of transportation to conduct a study pertaining to proposed improvements of State Route 9A in the towns of Ossining and Mount Pleasant
Summary: Authorizes the department of transportation to conduct a study pertaining to proposed improvements of State Route 9A in the towns of Ossining and Mount Pleasant.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to ordering a study and report on improvements of State Route 9A in the towns of Ossining and Mount Pleasant; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
